title: How to Send Your PayPal.Me Link: Easy Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open PayPal.
steps.content: Open PayPal. Go to https://www.paypal.com/ in your computer's web browser . If your PayPal page doesn't automatically open, click Log In in the top-right corner of the page, enter your email address and password , and click Log In . You can then click My PayPal in the top-right corner to open your page.

steps.title: Click Send & Request.
steps.content: Click Send & Request . It's a tab at the top of the page.

steps.title: Click the Request tab.
steps.content: Click the Request tab. You'll find this near the top of the Send & Request page.

steps.title: Click Share your Personal Profile.
steps.content: Click Share your Personal Profile . It's a link on the right side of the page. Doing so opens a window with your PayPal.Me profile. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click the arrow to the right of your name and profile picture.
steps.content: Click the arrow to the right of your name and profile picture. This will take you to a page where you can share your PayPal.Me link.

steps.title: Copy your PayPal.Me link.
steps.content: Copy your PayPal.Me link. You can click the button that says Copy link , or you can opt to share it on Facebook, Messenger, or X (Twitter).

steps.title: Paste the link where you want to share it.
steps.content: Paste the link where you want to share it. Go to the social media page, email inbox, or other place in which you want to paste the link, click the text box you want to use, and press Ctrl + V or âŒ˜ Command + V . The link will appear there. You can proceed with posting or sending the link depending on where you pasted the link (for example, if you're using an email service, you would enter the recipient's email address and then click the "Send" button).

steps.title: Open PayPal.
steps.content: Open PayPal. Tap the PayPal app icon, which resembles a white "P" on a dark-blue background. This will open your PayPal page if you're logged in. If prompted to log in, enter your email address and password and then tap Log In before proceeding. If you're using an iPhone or Android that has fingerprint ID, you may be prompted to scan it instead of entering your password.

steps.title: Tap your profile in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Tap your profile in the upper-right corner. The profile button has an icon of a person on it.

steps.title: Tap the username below your full name.
steps.content: Tap the username below your full name. Near the top of the screen, you'll see your PayPal profile picture, the legal name on your account, and then a username that starts with an @. That is your PayPal.Me username.

steps.title: Tap Share your profile.
steps.content: Tap Share your profile . It's a link at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Select an app.
steps.content: Select an app. Tap the app you want to use to share the link. This will open the app with your link in the "Share" field. For example, if you want to send your PayPal link to a friend via a text message, you would tap your phone's Messages app icon. This would open the Messages app with your PayPal link in the text box. You can also opt to just copy the link if you prefer to send it manually.

steps.title: Enter the contact's information if necessary.
steps.content: Enter the contact's information if necessary. If you're sharing your link via a text or an email, for example, you'll need to enter the information for the contact (or group of contacts) to whom you're sending the link. If you're sharing the link on social media, skip this step.

steps.title: Send or post your link.
steps.content: Send or post your link. Once you've added any necessary information to the link, tap the Send or Post button to share the link.
